short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download GIFs, clips, and stickers from Giphy easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of the hassle of copying Giphy links and using third-party tools just to download a GIF? This Chrome extension simplifies the process! With one-click downloads, you can easily save from Giphy to your device. 

While the UI may not be flashy, it gets the job done efficiently. Install now and start downloading effortlessly!
